annonstext:
Job description: Hardware Designer

We are looking for a skilled Hardware/PCB Designer to work on the cutting edge communication product design that involves high level design complexity.

Must to have key skills:

. You shall have Diploma/Engineering Graduation 

. Several years (10+) of experience within hardware/PCB design

. Experience with Altium and Cadence Allegro tools

. Extensive experience in Multilayer High-speed layout Design 

. Experience with Schematic capturing, Net-list, bill of material generation, placement and constraints  definition

Key responsibilities:

. Perform Layout design and implementation

. Perform design constraints, floor plan analysis and layer/stack up analysis 

. Perform HW design review

. Perform design integration and verification

. Used to work in Scrum teams.

. Good communication skills and a personal drive

If you think you have the right skills and experience, send your updated profile stating the reference number via e-mail.

Epost:  EMAIL 

Job Location: Skåne/Göteborg/Stockholm

Note: Application only via e-mail!
